headline: Halliburton Announces Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, May 22, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) announced today that its board of directors has declared a 2025 second quarter dividend of seventeen cents ($0.17) a share on the Company’s common stock payable on June 25, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 4, 2025.
